attributes.action: Introduce random drug testing for politicians.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians make decisions that affect millions. Recent footage has raised serious concerns. Drug testing would help restore public confidence and ensure they are fit to serve responsibly.
attributes.background: We want the Government to introduce mandatory, random drug testing for all MPs and ministers, with results made public, to ensure transparency, accountability and trust in public office.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce random alcohol & drug testing within the House of Commons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714495
